titleNullable: BlogMe News Analysis Case Study Python
descriptionNullable:
Welcome to the BlogMe Sentiment and Keyword Analysis Project! This project is part of my eagerness to learn more about data analytics and Python; it aims to apply Python and Tableau in real-world scenarios. BlogMe, a renowned blogging business, has a dataset of news articles that requires in-depth analysis to extract valuable insights.
**Business task:** Develop a dashboard that displays the analysis results, including sentiment, top articles, and extracted keywords. This dashboard will provide BlogMe with a clear and structured view of their news articles, helping them make informed decisions about content creation, marketing strategies, and audience engagement.

description:
Welcome to the BlogMe Sentiment and Keyword Analysis Project! This project is part of my eagerness to learn more about data analytics and Python; it aims to apply Python and Tableau in real-world scenarios. BlogMe, a renowned blogging business, has a dataset of news articles that requires in-depth analysis to extract valuable insights.
**Business task:** Develop a dashboard that displays the analysis results, including sentiment, top articles, and extracted keywords. This dashboard will provide BlogMe with a clear and structured view of their news articles, helping them make informed decisions about content creation, marketing strategies, and audience engagement.
